column4: Does anyone see anything wrong with my partitions?  http://bdh.voyager.com/ptable.txt
other than the fact you're drives are identical.  RAID?
dmraid is saying " ERROR: dos: partition address past end of RAID device"  .. I'm not sure why though.  the partition table seems fine to me
yeah.. raid mirror.. using the motherboard's onboard promise (fasttrak 378) sata support..
